Package program

Class DBconn

  • java.lang.Object
    • program.DBconn

  • public final class DBconn
extends java.lang.Object
    Class DBconn will handle the connection between the program and the database. Here I specified two types of connection, although for this program only the derbyConn() function will be called, as the database that is used is the embedded Derby DB.
    Since:
    2018-12-09
    Author:
    Luca Missaglia

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DBconn​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.sql.Connection derbyConn​()
      Static final function derbyConn, uses the constants provided to create an object of type Connection that can be used to query the DB.
      static int endConn​(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Static final function endConn, gets an object of type Connection in, and uses its method close() to terminate it.
      static java.sql.ResultSet queryDb​(java.lang.String query, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Static final function queryDB, is used whenever data manipulation is not needed.
      static int updateDb​(java.lang.String query, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Static final updateDB, used whenever the user needs to manipulate data in the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBconn

        public DBconn​()

    • Method Detail

      • derbyConn

        public static final java.sql.Connection derbyConn​()
        Static final function derbyConn, uses the constants provided to create an object of type Connection that can be used to query the DB. Does not need username or password, as the embedded Derby DB does not have these requirements.
        Returns:
        Connection - Database Connection Object

      • endConn

        public static final int endConn​(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Static final function endConn, gets an object of type Connection in, and uses its method close() to terminate it. Returns an integer to indicate the status of the operation.
        Parameters:
        conn - - DB Connection Object
        Returns:
        int - status of operation (1 = ok, -1 = error)

      • queryDb

        public static final java.sql.ResultSet queryDb​(java.lang.String query,
                                               java.sql.Connection conn)
        Static final function queryDB, is used whenever data manipulation is not needed. If it is, then need to use updateBD. Runs a query on a database, and returns the ResultSet of said query.
        Parameters:
        query - - String that contains query to run
        conn - - DB Connection Object
        Returns:
        ResultSet - ResultSet of the operation

      • updateDb

        public static final int updateDb​(java.lang.String query,
                                 java.sql.Connection conn)
        Static final updateDB, used whenever the user needs to manipulate data in the database. If data manipulation is not needed, use function queryDb(). Runs a query on a database, and returns the integer status of said query.
        Parameters:
        query - - String that contains query to run
        conn - - DB Connection Object
        Returns:
        status - integer status of operation (1 = ok, -1 = error)
